short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension to make working with TradingView charts a little bit more intuitive.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set custom shortcuts to quickly select drawing tools, toggle magnet mode and toggle shape visibility. Clicking on the plus icon at the price scale copies price under line into the clipboard. Right click the extension icon and choose "options" to set shortcuts.
